General.Name: Altamira Gold Corp
General.Description: Altamira Gold Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and mining of mineral properties in Brazil and Canada. Its primarily explores for gold, copper, and silver deposits. The company was formerly known as Equitas Resources Corp. and changed its name to Altamira Gold Corp. in April 2017. Altamira Gold Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 409 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1T2
